question:
Which among the following were the reasons for the failure of the Moderates?
1. They failed to initiate a mass movement
2. They failed to realize the actual intension of the British
3. Only educated Middle class participated in the Moderate movement
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: There was much reason behind the failure of the Moderates. They failed to initiate a mass movement. They failed to realize the actual intension of the British. They used to think that British rule will eventually benefit India. Only educated Middle class participated in the Moderate movement so lack of mass participation wrecked their movement.
